DOC.criteria: 1 . Histologically proven adenocarcinoma prostate evidence skeletal metastasis bone scan and/or CT scan . 2 . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status < /= 2 . ( Karnofsky Performance Status > /= 50 % ) 3 . Serum testosterone level < /= 50ng/ml 4 . Ongoing gonadal androgen deprivation therapy luteinizing hormonereleasing hormone ( LHRH ) analogues orchiectomy . Patients , orchiectomy , must maintain standard dose LHRH analogue therapy appropriate frequency duration study . 5 . Progression disease despite androgen ablation ( either document osseous soft tissue metastatic disease progression PSA criterion progression ) . ) Definition Progressive disease PSA evidence : PSA level least 5 ng/ml rise least 2 successive occasion , least 2 week apart . The participant need baseline test test show PSA increase . 6 . Discontinue diethylstilbestrol ( DES ) > /= 4 week antiandrogens > /= 6 week prior study drug . 7 . Steroids chronically prescribe noncancerrelated illness ( e.g . asthma COPD ) well control medical management permissible equivalent < 10 mg Prednisone daily . 8 .
